Agent controller usage of redis¶

webdis based¶

webdis is webfrontend for redis and hosted on port 7779. redis behind is on port 7770 you can use the excelent http://redisdesktop.com/ to visualize redis.

webdis only allows certain actions to make it secure

webdis default configuration

{
    "redis_host":   "127.0.0.1",

    "redis_port":   7770,
    "redis_auth":   null,

    "http_host":    "0.0.0.0",
    "http_port":    7779,

    "threads":  5,
    "pool_size": 20,

    "daemonize":    false,
    "websockets":   false,

    "database": 0,

    "acl": [
        {
            "enabled":  ["GET","SET", "DEL","HGET","HSET", "HDEL","EXISTS", "HEXISTS","PING"]
        }
    ],

        "verbosity": 6,
        "logfile": "/opt/jumpscale/var/webdis/webdis.log"
}

structure in database¶
